Author: super_crabs

Comment: At Washington’s Hubert Humphrey Building on Tuesday afternoon, Vani Hari, self-anointed “Food Babe,” highly influential food activist, best-selling author, and unabashed “MAHA (Make America Healthy Again) Mom,” approached the podium, beaming in a white dress and a seemingly natural healthy glow.   She was joined by a group of “MAHA Moms” and their young children, some of whom audibly cooed and fussed to their parents throughout a press conference that featured spirited statements from West Virginia Governor Patrick Morrisey, a Republican, and FDA Commissioner Marty Makary.   Read more: [https://www.nysun.com/article/once-mocked-woo-woo-caucus-scores-major-victory-in-robert-f-kennedy-jrs-ban-of-poison-food-dye?member\_gift=CUZ5qwd3crq4pmz-xrd](https://www.nysun.com/article/once-mocked-woo-woo-caucus-scores-major-victory-in-robert-f-kennedy-jrs-ban-of-poison-food-dye?member_gift=CUZ5qwd3crq4pmz-xrd)
Author: TheNewYorkSun
